import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../../models/user'; import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-edit', templateUrl: './user-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-edit.component.css'], providers: [UserService] }) export class UserEditComponent implements OnInit{ public page_title: string; constructor( private _userService: UserService ){ this.page_title = "ajustes de usuario"; this.user = new User(1, '', '', '', '', 'ROLE_USER', ''); this.status = 'Error'; } ngOnInit(): void { console.log('UserEditComponent Cargado!'); } }
